main event: A piece of metal was found and recovered in Upper Volta, Africa, related to a UFO sighting.
interesting points: The sighting involved a physical specimen found near Ouagadougou,The object was examined by a board,The sighting occurred on the night of 7-8 October 1962,The metal was identified under a project number related to Atlas Bombardment,The report indicates strict dissemination rules for the information.
sighted object: section of metal related to UFO
witness description: The board that examined the object
